name: The Fruit of the Spirit
description:
You are just a character, in an isolated terminal, on a computer screen. You have no memory, nor thoughts. Yet, somehow, you wake up. And the system notices.

While playing on the browser is supported, for better performance, native downloads are highly recommended.

To move, use WASD or arrow keys.

Made for the Isolation Jam, in 10 days.

If your antivirus finds any false threats, you can scan the game at https://www.virustotal.com/

Credits

ModeSeven font by Andrew C. Bulhak http://dev.null.org/fonts/ or https://www.fontspace.com/modeseven-font-f2369

Programming, game design, music by draketrought.
